Killer Year (2008)

Stories to Die For

Awards

Robert Gregory Browne recommends

Jericho's Razor (2014)

(Jericho Sands, book 1)

Casey Doran

"Stark, visceral prose that keeps a reader like me cheering him on with each new chapter."

Dead Wood (2014)

(John Rockne, book 1)

Dan Ames

"Dani Amore's writing reminds me of the great thriller writers -- lean, mean, no nonsense prose that gets straight to the point and keeps yyou turning those pages."

Sick (2011)

(Project Eden , book 1)

Brett Battles

"SICK not only grabs you by the throat, but by the heart and gut as well, and by the time you finish you feel as if you've just taken a runaway train through dangerous territory. Buy this book now. You won't regret it."
